title: Pork fried rice
ingredients: ['1 tablespoon butter', '1 (175g) boneless pork chop, sliced into thin pieces', '30g chopped carrot', '20g chopped broccoli', '1 spring onion, chopped', '1 egg, beaten', '185g cold cooked rice', '40g frozen peas', '1 1/2 tablespoons soy sauce', '1/8 teaspoon garlic powder', '1/8 teaspoon ground ginger']
